entry.title: AND IF YOU KNOW THE HISTORY?
entry.summary: AND IF YOU KNOW THE HISTORY? Thirty years ago, a Canadian based businessman called Fergus McCann, took over Celtic Football Club. entry.title: Celtic boost in race to sign £11 million Real Madrid player
